hymn.title: In daily walk and in our meetings too

layout.singingstanza: In dai -- ly walk and in our meet -- ings too, Christ is the cen -- ter, Christ is ev -- ery -- thing; 'Tis not for form nor doc -- trine good and true, But 'tis for Christ a -- lone we're ga -- ther -- ing.

lyrics.stanza: In daily walk and in our meetings too, Christ is the center, Christ is everything; 'Tis not for form nor doctrine good and true, But 'tis for Christ alone we're gathering.
Christ is the truth, 'tis Him we testify, Christ is the life, 'tis Him we minister; Christ is the Lord, 'tis Him we magnify, Christ is the Head, and we exalt Him here.
'Tis in His Name we meet, in Spirit act, With nothing in our mind to formalize; 'Tis by His pow'r we pray, in unction praise, And with Himself in spirit exercise.
All things forgetting, cleaving unto Christ, Applying Him until maturity; Let us count everything but loss for Him, For Him, our All in all, eternally.
